assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nikko Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of asphalt mixing and concrete batching plants in Asia. It offers asphalt mixing plants, including main units, aggregate supply units, combustion units, dust collectors, asphalt supply systems, and control systems; hot mix silo, filler silo, and dust mixers; and recycling, exhaust gas treatment, deodorization, and crushing systems. The company also provides concrete batching plants comprising air seal, automatic cleaning, and waste-water treatment systems, as well as control panels and water-pressure devices; and mixers. In addition, it offers belt conveyor systems; beverage container recycling, plastic recycling, and soil remediation plants; environmental equipment; and system control panels and software, as well as maintenance services and remote control systems. The company was formerly known as Nihon Kogu Product Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nikko Co., Ltd. in February 1968. Nikko Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1919 and is headquartered in Akashi, Japan.
